text: Halle is a village in the Joint Community (Samtgemeinde) of Uelsen, in Bentheim in Lower Saxony. Further centres are Belthoek, Bovenhoek, Dalenhoek, Erstenhoek and Kleihoek. ==References== ==Other websites== *Joint communityâ€™s webpage *Information about Halle Category:County of Bentheim (district)
title: Halle, Bentheim
